channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenPNE Project -- OpenPNE Plugin "opTimelinePlugin"
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenPNE Project -- OpenPNE Plugin "opTimelinePlugin"

item.title: CVE-2024-27278|2024-03-05T23:49:14.943Z -- OpenPNE Project -- OpenPNE Plugin "opTimelinePlugin"
item.description: OpenPNE Plugin "opTimelinePlugin" 1.2.11 and earlier contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. On the site which uses the affected product, when a user configures the profile with some malicious contents, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browsers of other users.
